TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WaitCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WaitCallback(state As Object)
type WaitCallback = delegate of obj -> unit

param.name: state
param.span: 包含回调方法要使用的信息的对象。

span.span: An object containing information to be used by the callback method.

summary.span: 表示要由线程池线程执行的回调方法。

span.span: Represents a callback method to be executed by a thread pool thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示要执行的回调方法线程。 represents a callback method that you want to execute on a thread. 通过将传递到回调方法创建委托构造函数。Create the delegate by passing your callback method to the constructor. 您的方法必须具有的签名如下所示。Your method must have the signature shown here. 任务排入队列以便执行通过传递委托给。Queue your task for execution by passing the delegate to . 在线程池线程变得可用时，将执行回调方法。Your callback method executes when a thread pool thread becomes available. > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 用户可以省略构造函数，并只需使用`AddressOf`运算符时将传递到回调方法。Visual Basic users can omit the constructor, and simply use the `AddressOf` operator when passing the callback method to . Visual Basic 会自动调用正确的委托构造函数。Visual Basic automatically calls the correct delegate constructor. 如果你想要将信息传递给回调方法，创建包含所需的信息的对象并将其传递给您执行的任务进行排队时。If you want to pass information to your callback method, create an object that contains the necessary information and pass it to when you queue your task for execution. 在执行回调方法，每次`state`参数包含此对象。Each time your callback method executes, the `state` parameter contains this object. 有关使用回调来同步线程池线程的详细信息，请参阅[管理的线程池](~/docs/standard/threading/the-managed-thread-pool.md)。For more information about using callbacks to synchronize thread pool threads, see [The Managed Thread Pool](~/docs/standard/threading/the-managed-thread-pool.md). ## Examples 本部分包含两个示例。This section contains two examples. 第一个示例演示如何可以队列由线程池执行一个简单的任务。The first example demonstrates how you can queue a simple task for execution by the thread pool. 第二个示例演示如何任务排入队列并将信息传递给它。The second example demonstrates how you can queue a task and pass information to it. **示例 1****Example 1** 此示例演示如何使用委托排队由线程池执行的任务。This example shows how to use the delegate to queue a task for execution by the thread pool. 代码示例使用方法重载将任务排入队列，由表示包装`ThreadProc`方法，以在线程变得可用时执行。The code example uses the method overload to queue a task, which is represented by a that wraps the `ThreadProc` method, to execute when a thread becomes available. 使用此重载不提供任何任务信息。No task information is supplied with this overload. 因此，可供信息`ThreadProc`方法被限制为该方法所属的对象。Therefore, the information that is available to the `ThreadProc` method is limited to the object the method belongs to. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ThreadPool QueueUserWorkItem0#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadPool QueueUserWorkItem0/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ThreadPool QueueUserWorkItem0#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadPool QueueUserWorkItem0/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ThreadPool QueueUserWorkItem0#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadPool QueueUserWorkItem0/VB/source.vb#1)] **示例 2****Example 2** 此示例演示如何创建包含任务信息的对象。This example shows how to create an object that contains task information. 它还演示了如何按线程池将该对象传递给已排队等待执行的任务。It also demonstrates how to pass that object to a task that is queued for execution by the thread pool. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ThreadPool QueueUserWorkItem1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadPool QueueUserWorkItem1/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ThreadPool QueueUserWorkItem1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadPool QueueUserWorkItem1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ThreadPool QueueUserWorkItem1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadPool QueueUserWorkItem1/VB/source.vb#1)]
